name: An Empty Classroom
description:
You are in an apparently empty classroom.  A strange feeling of being
watched comes over you, and you hear the faint rustle of robes.
   The only apparent exit is back east to the hallway.

exits.keywords: door metal~ 1 -1 2551 S #2555 A Hallway~    You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A sturdy iron door can be seen to the south.
